details.note: Weekly Accident & Emergency (A&E) Activity, and Waiting Times

Every week, on a Tuesday, Public Health Scotland releases an updated CSV file consisting of (a) counts of weekly A&E attendance at approximately 30 hospitals, and (b) waiting time metrics. The weekly counts span Monday → Sunday.
  • Detailed data description.
  • Scottish Health and Social Care Open Data
